sentences.en: ...a tale of how an honourable man pursuing honourable goals was afflicted with hubris and led his nation toward catastrophe.
sentences.cn: ...一个有关追求崇高目标的磊落君子如何因自高自大、而将自己的国家引向灾难的故事。

sentences.en: Among bankers I meet there is a lot more hubris than humility.
sentences.cn: 在我所遇到的银行家中,自大者比谦逊者多得多.

sentences.en: But along the way , says Prof Deshpand é , hubris set in.
sentences.cn: 但在发展过程中,德什潘德表示, 傲慢不知不觉地滋生了.

sentences.en: But history warns against such hubris.
sentences.cn: 但是历史告诉他们不能盲目乐观.

sentences.en: But the driving factor is hubris.
sentences.cn: 但主要驱动因素还是骄傲自大.

sentences.en: But the gods are offended by hubris.
sentences.cn: 但是,极度的高傲自信开罪了神灵.

sentences.en: Have scientists got too big for their boots ? Will their hubris bring Nemesis in due course?
sentences.cn: 在研究人造生物过程中,科学家们是否会由于自身的傲慢而给自身带来惩罚 呢 ?

sentences.en: Hence with regard to environmentalism we have a distorted hubris, even dark influence.
sentences.cn: 因此对于环保而言,我们有一种变质的傲慢, 甚至是一种负面的影响].

sentences.en: If that is the case, China might be able to avoid the pitfall of hubris.
sentences.cn: 如果事实如此, 中国也许能避免高傲自大的缺点.

sentences.en: In ancient Athens, hubris was a crime.
sentences.cn: 在古代的雅典, 狂妄自大是一种罪.

sentences.en: The Chinese should be wary of such hubris.
sentences.cn: 中国人应该警惕这种傲慢.

sentences.en: The Three Great Virtues of a Programmer: Laziness, Impatience and Hubris.
sentences.cn: 程序员的三大美德: 傲慢 、 急躁,以及懒惰.

sentences.en: The very hubris of French claims alarmed the other powers.

sentences.en: There is no safety in unlimited technological hubris.
sentences.cn: 在技术方面自以为是会很危险.
